mn132:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn132:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti,
mn132:2.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
mn132:2.4_2: upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi,
mn132:2.5_1: ānando upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi,
mn132:2.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
mn132:2.7_1: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi,
mn132:3.1_1: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesiṁ samādapesiṁ samuttejesiṁ sampahaṁsesiṁ,
mn132:4.2_0: Evaṁrūpo ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti,
mn132:4.2_1: evaṁvedano ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti,
mn132:4.2_2: evaṁsañño ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti,
mn132:4.2_3: evaṁsaṅkhāro ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti,
mn132:4.2_4: evaṁviññāṇo ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti—
mn132:5.2_0: Evaṁrūpo ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti,
mn132:5.2_1: evaṁvedano ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti,
mn132:5.2_2: evaṁsañño ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti,
mn132:5.2_3: evaṁsaṅkhāro ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti,
mn132:5.2_4: evaṁviññāṇo ahosiṁ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti—
mn132:6.2_0: Evaṁrūpo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti, evaṁvedano siyaṁ …pe…
mn132:6.5_0: evaṁviññāṇo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ samanvāneti—
mn132:7.2_0: Evaṁrūpo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti, evaṁvedano siyaṁ …pe…
mn132:7.5_0: evaṁviññāṇo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti tattha nandiṁ na samanvāneti—
mn132:8.2_1: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī
mn132:8.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
mn132:8.7_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ—
mn132:8.8_0: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn132:9.1_0: Kathañca, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati?
mn132:9.2_1: sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
mn132:9.8_0: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn132:11.1_1: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesiṁ samādapesiṁ samuttejesiṁ sampahaṁsesiṁ,
mn132:11.3_1: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi,
mn132:13-19.10_0: evaṁ kho, ānanda, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn132:13-19.11_0: Kathañca, ānanda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati …pe…
mn132:13-19.12_0: evaṁ kho, ānanda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn132:13-19.18_0: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
